channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Garden Sorbet Collection
channel.desc: Elevate your garden with our new Sorbet Collection! This curated range features pastel-inspired decor, furniture, planters and more to enliven your oasis.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Celebrate With Ben De Lisi
channel.desc: Celebrate With Ben De Lisi.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: What's Cooking with Eilidh
channel.desc: Love to cook? Then tune in every week for What's Cooking with Eilidh. We'll bring you the latest brands and exciting products, tempting recipes, expert tips and top hacks for every budding chef.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags with Aimee. Kestenberg
channel.desc: Discover our curated range of designer handbags and carry away premium-quality bags that will take pride of place in your collection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Butler & Wilson Fashion Jewellery
channel.desc: Designed and made in London, this range of couture fashion jewellery by the renowned Simon Wilson includes larger-than-life crystal-set pieces.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Grande Cosmetics
channel.desc: Feel naturally beautiful with Grande Cosmetics. Their transformative serums are designed to enhance your natural lashes, brows, hair, and lips, so you can feel empowered to be yourself every day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dress Shop
channel.desc: Whether you're on the outfit-hunt for a specific event or fancy a treat for your wardrobe, tune in to see a gorgeous array of dresses from your favourite QVC brands.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Summer Sandals
channel.desc: Sun's out, toes out: keep your feet looking stylish as we bring you the latest in summer footwear trends. From strappy sandals to heels, we have everything you need to update your wardrobe this year.

channel.title: Summer Sandals

channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sara Davies Storage Savings
channel.desc: Join us as we take a look at Sara Davies' fantastic home styling and storage selection, with today's focus on some incredible storage savings.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Mediterranean Escape Garden
channel.desc: Create your own Mediterranean oasis filled with fragrant florals, citrus delights and architectural plants with lush foliage. Plus mosaic decor, glazed pots and sun canopies to help complete the look.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion Deals
channel.desc: Elevate your style with Ruth Langsford's chic fashion collection. From classic jeans to vibrant prints, find the perfect pieces to boost your fashion confidence.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.
